title: Cute Kitchen Apron Kiss Me I'm Italian Chef Aprons
features: ORIGINAL APRON DESIGNS: Fashionable and unisex, aprons for men and women have them looking their best when cooking in the kitchen or as a Grill Master.
OUTSTANDING FABRIC QUALITY: Our chef aprons are made from a strong polyester and cotton blended material measuring 30 inches wide and 34 inches long.
EXTRA LONG TIES: This bib apron can be tied in the back or wrapped around and tied in front. A true multi-purpose kitchen apron with exceptional features.
PROTECT YOUR CLOTHES: Don't let another spill ruin your clothes! At the same time, show off your personality with a smart and good looking apron.
KITCHEN APRON GIFT IDEA: Our funny aprons make a terrific gift for those that cook. You deserve an apron with quality craftsmanship that will last for years.
description: Premium Quality Apron For Home Cooks

Made from a polyester and cotton blend, our kitchen aprons resist stains and splatters which makes washing easy. Also, it comes out of the dryer virtually wrinkle-free without ironing. No Fade, No Shrink.
Full Coverage At A Reasonable Price

Right at home in the kitchen or on the grill, our cooking aprons will protect your clothes when things get messy! This white apron is 30 inches wide and 34 inches long (not including the ties) and provides comfortable coverage for small, medium and large cooks.
The extra long 39 inch ties can be tied in the back or front. This is a handy feature especially for those with a larger waist.
Protect your clothing with style! Whether you're tending the barbecue grill, baking a batch of cupcakes, or everyday kitchen cooking, you'll look and feel just like a professional chef.
